page.title: 04The Anglican Church
page.content: {Anglican Church}_ High Street {Vicarage}_ 5,Minster Road {Vicar}_ Rev.Tom Mitchell,who also looks after the Anglican church at West Stockwith. {Electoral Roll}_ 52 {Stewardship Roll}_ much larger {Average attendance}_ 25 {Quota}(to be paid to the diocese of Southwell) _Â£3,000 p.a. {Services}_ Sundays- Holy Communion at 8.30 a.m. and 10.30 a.m. - Family Communion once per month at 10.30 a.m. (3rd Sunday in the month) {Sunday School}_ 10.30 a.m. {Other devotional meetings}_ Mothers Union held every 3rd Wednesday of each month. The Church also has a separate hall with a Kitchen and toilets used for Sunday School and other activities organised by the Church.
